synopsis.text: Yanagida, Hirai, and Yamaguchi, three talented graduates from Tama Art University, present a heartwarming tale set in the picturesque backdrop of a southern island. The story unfolds when a young girl accidentally loses her cherished anklet to the unforgiving ocean. A magical boy, gifted with extraordinary powers, retrieves the precious ornament from the ocean depths. As the girl ventures deeper into the sea, the boy's assistance becomes crucial in navigating the treacherous waters. The narrative beautifully intertwines the harsh realities of the ocean with the tender bond of friendship formed between the two characters, all while showcasing the enchanting allure of the sea. This captivating anime, completed in 2019, invites viewers to immerse themselves in a nostalgic journey of friendship and self-discovery.
